desc.gl:
Focus use +1

When using Focus:
 • Slight ATK Up boost
 • MAX BRV Up, ATK Up duration +2
 • Self: 10 turns Black Mages' Torch

After using Focus:
 • Fire becomes Fire+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 3; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; triggers additional HP attack after use) for 6 turns

While Black Mages' Torch active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (2-hit Fire magic BRV attack; moderately increased cumulative damage)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack)
